title: Drawing, "Three-story Town Mansion,", 1775–1800
medium:
Pen and brown ink, gray wash, traces of graphite
Support: white laid paper laid down on white laid paper
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Three-story Town Mansion,", 1775–1800.
1775–1800. Pen and brown ink, gray wash, traces of graphite
Support: white laid paper laid down on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-3679.
